title: Treasury of Christmas Crafts & Foods
description: Every family album has pictures that bring back warm memories of loved ones and friends celebrating Christmas in their special way. To help create your own Christmas traditions, fun, and festivities, we give you this treasure house of ideas. In it are Christmas ornaments, decorations, playthings and gifts. All will help make this Christmas the happiest one for you, your family, and your friends.
author: Joan Cravens
